catalog.name: OSM buildings
catalog.description: OSM buildings. It is a 3D buildings layer, derived from OpenStreetMap.

members.name: 3D from cesium ION
members.description: OSM buildings streamed through cesium ion, using Cesium 3D tiles (see https://github.com/CesiumGS/3d-tiles). The reference system that is being used is WGS84.
